title: Biden signs legislation to declassify certain intelligence on Covid pandemic origins
description: Biden signed legislation requiring the declassification of information on any possible links between a lab in China and the origins of the Covid-19 pandemic.

title: Key banking crisis lesson: 'The first line of defense should always be cash,' advisor says
description: The collapse of Silicon Valley Bank and the banking crisis provide "a great case study" for clients, advisor says. Here's what investors need to know.

title: JPMorgan Chase can be sued by Virgin Islands over Jeffrey Epstein sex trafficking claims
description: Jeffrey Epstein, whose former friends included Donald Trump and Bill Clinton, was a  JPMorgan Chase client and owner of property in the Virgin Islands.

title: Hedge-fund manager Nelson Peltz says the government should insure all bank deposits — for a price
description: Peltz's proposed plan comes after uninsured deposits contributed to the failure of Silicon Valley Bank.

title: Virgin Orbit scrambles to avoid bankruptcy as deal talks continue
description: Virgin Orbit senior leadership held daily talks with potential investors through the weekend, people familiar with the matter told CNBC.

title: Amazon to lay off 9,000 more workers in addition to earlier cuts
description: Amazon will lay off 9,000 more employees, CEO Andy Jassy said in a memo to staff on Monday.

title: The $17 billion wipeout of Credit Suisse bondholders has not gone down well in Europe
description: Credit Suisse’s additional tier one bonds are set to be wiped out following the struggling bank’s takeover by UBS.

title: France's Macron faces no-confidence vote as protestors arrested, refinery strikes continue
description: The French government faces two no confidence motions Monday afternoon over its pension system changes.

title: World’s top climate scientists issue ‘survival guide for humanity,’ call for major course correction
description: The latest report from the U.N.'s Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change provides world leaders with a gold-standard summation of modern climate science.

title: New Starbucks CEO Laxman Narasimhan takes over nearly two weeks earlier than expected
description: Starbucks' board announced Laxman Narasimhan as Howard Schultz's latest successor in September.

title: Brent oil prices slip under $72 per barrel amid banking turmoil
description: Oil prices logged losses, amid jitters in the banking sector.

title: 'Shotgun wedding': What the UBS rescue of Credit Suisse means for global markets
description: Despite bold proclamations about a return to stability, the sale of Credit Suisse to UBS does not appear to have laid to rest contagion concerns.

title: Bitcoin market gains $26 billion after hitting 9-month high as banking crisis sparks rally
description: Bitcoin jumped on Monday as some investors turned to digital currencies amid a crisis in the traditional banking sector.

title: UBS shares slide 10%, Credit Suisse craters 60% after takeover deal
description: UBS agreed to buy Credit Suisse as part of a cut-price deal designed to alleviate panic in the banking sector.

title: Saudi National Bank loses over $1 billion on Credit Suisse investment
description: Credit Suisse's largest shareholder confirmed to CNBC that it had suffered a loss of around 80% on its investment.

title: Asia's regulators say banking system is robust and stable after UBS-Credit Suisse takeover deal
description: From Hong Kong to Australia and Singapore, authorities urged that their domestic banking systems were stable.

title: One country, two crypto systems: Hong Kong harbors crypto hub ambitions despite China's crackdown
description: The city's digital asset push stands in contrast with the mainland, where Beijing has effectively banned trading and stamped out crypto-related activities.
